ios_app_store.subtitle: Never Miss a Claim Again
ios_app_store.description:
Stop losing money on expired warranties.

WarrantyVault helps you track warranty expiration dates, store receipts, and get reminded before it's too late.

KEY FEATURES

+ Quick Add: Snap a receipt photo, enter details, done in seconds
+ Smart Dashboard: See all warranties organized by status
+ Expiration Alerts: Get notified before warranties expire
+ Secure Storage: Your data stays on your device

PREMIUM FEATURES

+ Unlimited Items: Track your entire household
+ Cloud Backup: Never lose your data
+ PDF Export: Insurance-ready documentation

Stop losing $400+ annually on expired warranties. Download WarrantyVault today.

Questions? Contact support@warrantyvault.app

Privacy Policy: https://warrantyvault.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://warrantyvault.app/terms

android_play_store.short_description: Track warranties, store receipts, get expiration alerts. Never lose a claim.
android_play_store.full_description:
Stop losing money on expired warranties.

WarrantyVault helps you track warranty expiration dates, store receipts, and get reminded before it's too late. The average household loses $400 annually on expired warranties. Don't be average.

KEY FEATURES

* QUICK ADD - Snap a receipt photo, enter product details, save in seconds. No complicated forms.

* SMART DASHBOARD - See all your warranties at a glance. Items grouped by status: Expiring Soon, Active, Expired.

* EXPIRATION ALERTS - Get notified 30 days before warranties expire. Configure custom reminder timing.

* SECURE STORAGE - Your data stays on your device. No account required for core features.

* ORGANIZED CATEGORIES - Electronics, appliances, furniture, vehicles - find items quickly.

PREMIUM FEATURES (Optional Subscription)

* Unlimited Items - Track your entire household (free tier: 10 items)
* Cloud Backup - Sync across devices, never lose data
* PDF Export - Insurance-ready documentation
* Custom Categories - Organize your way

PRICING

* Free: 10 items, local storage, all core features
* Premium: $3.99/month or $29.99/year (save 37%)
* 7-day free trial available

WHY WARRANTYVAULT?

Unlike complex home inventory apps, WarrantyVault does one thing well: warranty lifecycle management. Simple enough to actually use. Powerful enough to save you money.

QUESTIONS?

Contact: support@warrantyvault.app
Privacy Policy: https://warrantyvault.app/privacy
Terms of Service: https://warrantyvault.app/terms

Subscription auto-renews unless cancelled. Cancel anytime in Play Store settings.

keyword_strategy.competitor_analysis: Under My Roof targets broad home inventory. Sortly targets businesses at $24/month. MyItems focuses on general item tracking. WarrantyVault differentiates with warranty-specific focus at accessible price point.
keyword_strategy.keyword_difficulty_assessment: Warranty tracker: Medium competition, good search volume. Receipt tracker: Lower difficulty, good secondary traffic. Home inventory: High competition but valuable association.

audience_building: Build email waitlist for launch notification
Engage in home improvement and personal finance communities
Share warranty tips content on social media
content_preparation: Prepare press kit with screenshots and description
pre_launch.press_outreach: Target personal finance bloggers, home improvement sites, and app review sites. Emphasize savings angle ($400/year) and simplicity story.
pre_launch.beta_testing_program: TestFlight for iOS, Internal testing track for Android. Target 20-50 beta testers from email waitlist. Collect structured feedback.

launch_day.announcement_strategy: Email to waitlist. Social media posts. Submit to Product Hunt. Personal network sharing.
launch_day.social_media_campaign: Launch posts on Twitter/X, Facebook, Instagram. Focus on relatable pain points (lost receipts, expired warranties, wasted money).
launch_day.community_engagement: Respond to all launch comments. Thank early reviewers. Address feedback publicly. Build relationship with early adopters.

post_launch.user_onboarding_optimization: Monitor onboarding completion. A/B test first item prompts. Optimize permission request flow. Track activation metrics.
post_launch.feedback_collection: In-app feedback button. App store review responses. Email survey to active users. Beta tester follow-up interviews.
post_launch.iteration_planning: Address top 3 user-reported issues immediately. Prioritize feature requests by frequency and value. Release updates regularly.
growth_marketing: ASO optimization based on performance data

potential_risks.mitigation_strategy: Follow guidelines strictly. Test subscription flows thoroughly. Prepare demo account if needed.
Focus on ASO optimization. Leverage personal networks. Consider small paid acquisition test.
Optimize onboarding. Add first item immediately. Enable notifications early. Clear value demonstration.
Respond to all reviews. Fix issues quickly. Ask satisfied users to rate. In-app support easy to access.

contingency_plans.response_plan: A/B test paywall timing and design. Improve premium value communication. Consider pricing adjustment.
contingency_plans.decision_criteria: If conversion < 5% after 30 days with 100+ users at item limit

contingency_plans.response_plan: Immediate hotfix via EAS Update if JavaScript. Full rebuild if native. Communicate transparently with users.
contingency_plans.decision_criteria: Any bug affecting core functionality or data integrity

immediate_updates.rationale: Address user-reported issues from launch feedback
Improve activation based on analytics data

feature_pipeline.user_value: Find items faster with large inventories

platform_expansion.localization_plan: Start with English-speaking markets. Localize based on download geography. RTL support ready.
